review:
Valentine, good afternoon!
Thank you for your feedback.
My name is Alexander, and I am Chef Trullo. I think I recall your order. Turkey cutlets were prepared for you 28 minutes from the time of order. Steam the cutlet for at least 25 minutes and for this you need to bring the water to a boil. Cooking main dishes within half an hour is considered the norm. Moreover, each order is prepared for each guest individually (from under the knife). We do not cook 20 cutlets in the morning and do not heat them in the microwave.
If I described the wrong case, please shed some light on the situation.
"All for a long time" does not carry a semantic load and I do not understand what is at stake.
Thank you for understanding !
name: Andrey Yatskiv
